description: Numbers that are congruent to {0, 5, 7} mod 8.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,1,-1).
formula: G.f.: x^2*(5+2*x+x^2)/((1-x)^2*(1+x+x^2)). [_Colin Barker_, May 14 2012]a(n) = a(n-1) + a(n-3) - a(n-4). [_Vincenzo Librandi_, May 16 2012]
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[0, 5, 7, 8]; [n le 4 select I[n] else Self(n-1)+Self(n-3)-Self(n-4): n in [1..70]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 16 2012
